result.execSummary:
The defendant Justin L Mathews was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Justin L Mathews is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Justin L Mathews was found guilty of Manufacture/Deliver Heroin (<3g), a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(d)1.
  • Justin L Mathews was found guilty of Neglecting a Child, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.21(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: IMPOSED & STAYED.   Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program.  Defendant is eligible for the Substance Abuse Program.
Consec to ct 2 & any other sentence.

miscConds.notes: $250 DNA surcharge and court costs remitted. $92 VW surcharge  to be collected by the Dept of Corrections.  Court financial obligations shall be paid at the rate of 25% of the prison wages and work release funds.  Restitution shall be paid pursuant to separate court order.

Defendant shall not use/possess alcohol, drug paraphernalia and/or controlled substances without a valid prescription.   Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with KSM if there is any alcohol or unprescribed medications in Def's system. May not reside anywhere there are unprescribed controlled substances, paraphernalia or alcohol.
Attend and successfully complete any AODA def is in.

timeConds.notes: With huber. Stayed for successful completion of AODA program and consec to ct 2.

supervisions.notes: Court costs remitted. $67 VW surcharge  to be paid as a condition of Probation in ct 1.
With huber. Consec to all other sentences.

Def entered a plea of guilty to counts 1 and 2. DISM repeaters and cts 3 and 4. Court accepted def's plea, found and adjudged defn guilty. Bail continued. Parties request PSI. Will be argued sentencing. State's cap: 5 ic, 5 es or recommendation of PSI whichever is less.
